popover.primary: A mastery path focused on healing and restorative powers
A mastery path focused on offensive and damaging powers
A mastery path focused on hindering and weakening foes

data.name: Life Leaka
data.description: You deal 980 Elemental damage to your target over 15 seconds.

data.name: 'Ey, Quit Bleedin'
data.description: Heals your target for 1700 health over 15 seconds.

data.name: I'll Take That!
data.description: Deals 377 Elemental damage to your target, and heals your defensive target for 150% of the damage done.

data.name: Don' Feel Nuthin
data.note:
Mork's Waaagh! increases effectiveness.
Target must be in your group or warband.
data.description: Surrounds an ally with a magical barrier that absorbs up to 1387 damage for up to 9 seconds.

data.name: Bunch o' Waaagh
data.description: You concentrate on your target for up to 6 seconds, repeatedly dealing 477 Elemental damage to them as long as you maintain your concentration.

data.name: Mork's Buffer
data.description: Increases all resistances of your group mates within 100 feet by 252 for 1 hour.

data.name: Look Over There!
data.description: You Detaunt your target, making them hate you less and causing them to deal 50% damage to you for 15 seconds. If you attack anyone that you have Detaunted, the effect will immediately end.

data.name: Bigger, Better, An' Greener
data.description:
Heals your target for 1258 health.
This is a fragile spell, and will sometimes be set back by a small amount if you are damaged while casting it.

data.name: Bleed Fer' Me
data.description: You deal 1488 Elemental damage to your target over 24 seconds and your defensive target is healed for 150% of the damage done.

data.name: Gedup!
data.description: Resurrects your target with 20% health.

data.name: 'Ere We Go!
data.description: Everyone in your group within 100 feet will do an additional 187 Elemental damage on their next attack within 10 seconds.

data.name: Stop hittin' me!
data.description: Your chance to disrupt attacks is increased by 5%, and you Detaunt all enemies within 30 feet for 10 seconds, making them hate you less and causing them to deal 50% damage to you. If you attack anyone that you have Detaunted, the effect will immediately end.

data.name: Greener 'n Cleaner
data.note: Target must be Cursed or Ailing
data.description: You cleanse an ally, removing one Curse or Ailment.  If an effect is removed, your ally will absorb up to 262 damage over 10 seconds.

data.name: Yer Not So Bad
data.description: Steals 180 Action Points from your target over 9 seconds.

data.name: Gather Round
data.description: Heals group members within 100 feet for 898 health.

data.name: Eeeek!
data.description: You blast back all enemies within 30 feet of you, knocking them back a medium distance and snaring them by 20% for 10 seconds. Monsters will be knocked down by the blast.

data.name: Yer A Weaklin'
data.description: Everyone within 20 feet of your target will have their Strength, Intelligence and Ballistic Skill reduced by 120 for 20 seconds.

data.name: Big Waaagh!
data.description: Deals 434 Elemental damage.

data.name: You'z Squishy
data.description: Your target and all other enemies within 20 feet of them have their Toughness reduced by 120 for 20 seconds.

data.name: Burst O' Waaagh!
data.description: Any time you critically hit with a spell that grants Waaagh!, an additional Waaagh! will be granted as well.  Tactic can not trigger more than once every 3 seconds.

data.name: Green Cleanin'
data.description: If Greener 'N Cleaner successfully removes an effect from an ally, then they will also regain 534 health over 9 seconds.

data.name: Extra Special Mushrooms
data.description: Increases your chance to critically heal by 10%.

data.name: Dat Makes Me Dizzy
data.description: Your can now resurrect allies instantly, but you are stunned for 3 seconds after casting.

data.name: Mork Is Watchin'
data.description: Increases your chance to critically hit enemies by 10%.

data.name: Git Outta Here!
data.description: Reduces Eeeek!'s cooldown time by 40 seconds.

data.name: Get Movin'!
data.description: Any time one of your groupmates damages an enemy with 'Ere We Go, they will gain 150 points of Morale.

data.name: Ain't Done Yet!
data.description: Your healing abilities become 40% more effective when the target is below 25% hit points.

data.name: Empowered Mastery
data.description: Your mastery level is increased by 1 in {SPEC_1: Component Id undefined not found}

data.name: Eternal Mastery
data.description: Your mastery level is increased by 1 in {SPEC_2: Component Id undefined not found}

data.name: Infinite Mastery
data.description: Your mastery level is increased by 1 in {SPEC_3: Component Id undefined not found}

data.name: Augment Vigor
data.description: Increases your Wounds by 160.

data.name: Gork Sez Stop
data.description: Your target suffers 600 damage over 2s. If the target moves, the duration is restarted.

data.name: Breath of Mork
data.description: Heals your target for 501 health every 3 seconds over 9 seconds. Each pulse also heals those around the target within 30 feet.

data.name: You Weren't Using Dat
data.description: Removes 100 AP from each enemy within 30 feet, and gives 50% of the stolen AP to you.

data.name: Divine Fury
data.description: You deal 25% more damage, but all of your healing becomes 20% less effective.

data.name: Discipline
data.description: Increases your Willpower by 160.

data.name: Subtlety
data.description: All of your heals will cause enemy monsters to hate you 25% less than normal.

data.name: Restorative Burst
data.description: Any time one of your direct healing effects critically heals an ally, you will regain 40 Action Points over 3 seconds.

data.name: Divine Favor
data.description: A strong heal that will restore 1800 health to your target.

data.name: Rampaging Siphon
data.description: Deals 600 damage to all enemies within 30 feet, and heals group members within 100 feet for the full amount of the damage dealt.

data.name: Steal Life
data.description: Your target suffers 900 damage over 9 seconds, and you are healed for a half of the damage dealt.

data.name: Focused Mind
data.description: For the next 10 seconds, you will remove and ignore any silencing, disarming, rooting, snaring effects and your abilities will build 50% faster and may not be set back.

data.name: Divine Protection
data.description: Each group member within 100 feet is surrounded by a protective shield for the next 10 seconds that will absorb up to 4500 damage from melee abilities.

data.name: Alter Fate
data.description: Resurrects all groupmates within 30 feet. Anyone who is brought back from the dead will also be healed for 424 over 9 seconds, and they will deal 20% more damage for 10 seconds.

data.name: Whazat Behind You?!
data.description:
Any time you are hit, there is a 25% chance that you will Detaunt the enemy, making them hate you less and causing them to deal 75% damage to you for 5 seconds.
If you hit anyone that you have Detaunted, the effect will end.

data.name: Too Smart For Dat
data.description: Increases your Spirit resistance by 252.

data.name: RUN AWAY!
data.description: Any time you are hit, there is a 25% chance that your movement speed will be increased by 30% for 5 seconds.

data.name: Flee
data.description:
You run away from the battle in a mad panic, increasing your run speed by 30 for 10 seconds. You immediately lose all of your action points, any career mechanic points, and your Morale will begin to drop, and you will not begin to regain action points until 10 seconds have passed.

You can use this ability again to cancel the effect early, but you will still remain panicked and will not regain action points for the full duration.

data.name: Gork'll Fix It
data.description: Your target regains 370 health immediately then continues to gain another 445 health over 5 seconds.

data.name: Brain Bursta
data.description: Deals 477 Elemental damage to your target.

data.name: Gork Fix'd It
data.description: Gork'll Fix It becomes 35% better on allies, but 15% less effective on you.

data.name: Sticky Feetz
data.description: For 10 seconds, all enemies within 20 feet of a spot that you select will have their Elemental resistance reduced by 378 and become snared, reducing their run speed by 60%.

data.name: Lookit What I Did!
data.description: Gork'll Fix It will now also restore 40 Action Points to the target.

data.name: Shrug It Off
data.description: An ally is charged with Waaagh for 30 seconds, allowing them to recover from near fatal wounds. If the allies health is reduced below 20%, this effect will immediately dispel itself to restore 1033 health if they are still alive. A player may only be affected by a single Shrug it Off at a time.

data.name: Pass It On
data.description: Any time you heal an ally with a Path of Mork ability, there is a 25% chance that another ally within 30 feet of them will also gain 223 health as well.

data.name: Do Sumfin Useful
data.description: Your target's Toughness is increased by 240 and they regain 1360 health over 10 seconds.

data.name: Feelz No Pain
data.description: Heals all of your group mates within 100 feet for 1530 health over 10 seconds and decreases damage against them  to 75% for 10 seconds

data.name: Ere We Goes Again
data.description: Ere We Go will now deal 225 damage, and it will now affect your allies' next 2 attacks.

data.name: Geddoff!
data.description: Deals 287 Elemental damage to your target and all other enemies within 20 feet of them, and knocks them backwards.

data.name: Mork's Touch
data.description: All of your offensive spells gain a 25% chance to remove a Blessing from the victim. Any time that this successfully occurs, the enemy will suffer an additional 225 Elemental damage as well.

data.name: Gork's Barbs'
data.description: Gork takes interest in your target, reducing all incoming heals by 50% for 10 seconds, and will deal 498 Elemental damage to anyone healing his new toy.

data.name: Hurts, Don't It?
data.description: Brain Bursta will now also reduce the victim's Toughness by 240 for 20 seconds, and they will lose 150 points of Morale as well.

data.name: Da Waaagh! Is Coming
data.description: Deals 487 Elemental damage to your target, and will then damage another target within 20 feet of the last, damaging up to 9 different targets total. Targets can not be hit more than once by the ability.

data.name: Fists of Gork
data.description: Deals 1800 damage and knocks back all enemy targets within 20 feet of your target.

data.name: Waaagh! Frenzy
data.description: Reduces the build time of I'll Take That! by 0.5 seconds but increases the cost by 10 Action Points

data.name: Scuse Me!
data.description: A cone of energy strikes enemies in front of you, up to 40 feet away, dealing 475 Elemental damage and reducing their Elemental resistance by 378 for 20 seconds.

data.name: You Really Got Nuthin
data.description: Reduces You Got Nuthin's cooldown time by 10 seconds.

data.name: You Got Nuthin!
data.description: Deals 396 Elemental damage and silences your target, making them unable to use magic for 5 seconds.

data.name: Nuthin' But Da WAAAGH!
data.description: Don' Feel Nuthin will also cause your target to deal 15% more damage as long as the barrier is protecting them.

data.name: Fury of Da Green
data.description: A surge of Waaaagh explodes from your target and damages up to 4 enemies within 20 feet of them, dealing 377 Elemental damage to each, and bestowing 150% of it upon your defensive target.

data.name: Steal Yer Thunder
data.description: Reduces the stats of all enemies within 30 feet of your target by 40 (except wounds), and increases all your groupmember's stats by 40 (except wounds) for 15 seconds

data.name: Get'n Smarter
data.description: Steals 120 Intelligence from your target while dealing 950 Elemental damage over 15 seconds.
